title: The ONLY Garden Planting Schedule Youll EVER Need

tasks.task: Design and create a garden planting schedule
subtasks: Research and compile frost dates for each zone
Determine optimal times for seed starting, transplantation, and direct sowing
Include visual aids (e.g., colors for seed starting, transplantation, and harvesting)
Provide harvesting guidance for each vegetable

tasks.task: Use the garden planting schedule as a reference
subtasks: Plan planting times based on zone and vegetable requirements
Monitor frost dates in the local area
Prepare for the gardening season in advance
Follow the schedule for successful seed starting and vegetable growth
